text: Service is great as I can text and enquire about price & stocks available. The customer service even took the time to also explain the promotion for each product that I asked. Environment is clean and they are doing grooming too. Looking at the dogs there, itâ€™s obvious they are doing a great job.
Very nice and clean store. Store staff were very friendly and helpful as well. There is clear visual access to the grooming room to ensure your pets are well-treated during rhe grooming process
Joey always bring such a warm and friendly atmosphere to my puppy. Her kindness makes a big difference.
Nice and clean store with natural treats for dogs! And friendly staff. Will be back again

Terrible experience on the hotel and grooming. We left our pom with them and she came back with no fur.

NEVER USE THEIR SERVICE.

You can judge by the pictures, before and after a week with them.
